pages.text: The $(item)Heat Sawmill$() can cut wood much more efficiently than hands can. This includes cutting $(thing)Logs$() into $(thing)Planks$(), and $(thing)Planks$() into $(thing)Sticks$(). This process will also produce $(item)Sawdust$(), which can be made into $(item)Particle Board$() for decoration.$(br2)Items can be inserted/extracted from any side except top and bottom.
